# Zero to Hero：2017年机器之心AI高分概述文章全集

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zero-to-hero-2017-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zero-to-hero-2017-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zero-to-hero-2017-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji
zero-to-hero-2017-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zero-to-hero-erlingyiqi-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji
zero-to-hero-erlingyiqi-nian-jiqi-zhixin-ai-gaofen-gaishu-wenzhang-quanji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
